section.title: Accessing Knowledge for the First Time
section.para: To access Knowledge Editor, you need a username and temporary password assigned to you by an administrator who has permissions to manage the application. You should receive the login information and url in your e-mail.

Once you log in, you may see one of two screens:
Generic Welcome Screen
If the administrator has not assigned projects to your account, you can only edit your user profile, e-mail, and password. Contact your administrator for project assignment.
Project-specific Welcome Screen
If a project has been assigned to you, Knowledge Editor will load, providing you a view of the taxonomy and announcements panels.
Image of the Editor screen after login displays a taxonomy list, announcements, and assigned projects.

simplesect.title: What happens if I forget my username/login?
simplesect.para: There are links to request your username or a password reset on the login page of the application. Select the information you need and fill out the information to receive next steps.

simplesect.title: What are my account permissions?
simplesect.para: You can review your account permissions under Account Preferences. To access this page, select your username in the top navigation menu, then select "Account Preferences". The table will display the projects assigned to you and the permissions you have under each project.
